A mụrụ Shibe ma zụlite ya na Umlazi, Kwazulu-Natal
Ọ gara Ganges Secondary School, ebe ndị nkuzi ya gbara ya ume ịchụso ime ihe nkiri
Dịka nwatakịrị, Shibe ga-esonye mgbe niile na egwuregwu obodo na Umlazi
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara ịmụ ihe nkiri na Technikon Natal. Shibe, ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya na Technikon Natal, guzobere otu ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Amagugu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, ọ gara Johannesburg iji gbakwunyere nrọ ya ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
Mgbe ọ bịarutere na Johannesburg, ọ chere ihe mgbochi dị iche iche ihu mana ihu ọma ya gbanwere mgbe o mere mkpọsa maka mmata HIV / AIDS
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri a na-akpọ The Stripes of a Hero

N'afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Sifiso na usoro ihe nkiri SABC1 Gaz'lam Usoro ahụ gara n'ihu ịnata ọtụtụ nhọpụta site na South African Film and Television Awards. Mgbe ọ gwụchara ihe nkiri nke oge mbụ nke Gaz'lam, a tụbara Shibe dị ka James na ihe nkiri James 'Journey to Jerusalem, nke Ra'anan Alexandrowicz dere ma duzie. Ihe nkiri ahụ na-agba gburugburu onye Africa nọ n'afọ iri na ụma aha ya bụ James onye na-aga njem ala nsọ maka obodo ya.
Shibe mechara merie ihe nrite Best Male Actor na Jerusalem International Film Festival. O nwetakwara ọrụ na obere usoro Human Cargo nke Canada

Usoro ahụ meriri Gemini Awards asaa na Directors Guild Awards abụọ. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na usoro ndị Britain Wild At Heart na Mtunzini.com; Otú ọ dị, Shibe gbara arụkwaghịm na nke ikpeazụ n'ihi esemokwu ego.

N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Mad Dog na ihe nkiri The Trail N'afọ 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Mandla Nyawose na usoro ihe nkiri Bay of Plenty N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya ka ọ gosipụta ọrụ Thami na usoro ihe nkiri A Place Called Home Site n'afọ 2010 ruo afọ 2014, Shibe gosipụtara àgwà nke Kila, onye ọkwọ ụgbọala tagzi nwere ọgụgụ isi, onye nwere ọgụgụ isi na onye na-eme ihe ike na e.tv soap opera Scandal!
E nyere ya ihe nrite Best Actor na Duku Duku Awards maka ọrụ ya dịka Kila.
N'afọ 2015, Shibe nwetara ọrụ na e.tv telenovela Ashes to Ashes; ngosipụta ya nke agwa Kgosi mere ka a họpụta ya na SAFTA maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma.
N'afọ 2017, ọ hapụrụ Johannesburg gaa Durban iji sonye na ihe ngosi telivishọn South Africa a na-elekarị anya, Uzalo, ebe ọ na-egosi ọrụ Qhabanga Mhlongo.
Shibe nwere nwa nwoke dị afọ isii.
